text: Albina Kelmendi (born 27 January 1988) is a Kosovo-Albanian singer and songwriter. She was born in Peja, Kosovo (then part of Yugoslavia), to a family of singers. == Competitions == In 2014, she was the runner-up of the fourth season of The Voice Albania. The next year, she took part in the 12th edition of Top Fest (an Albanian music competition). == Eurovision Song Contest == In 2022, Albina and five members of her family (mother, father, sister and brother) took part in Albania's entry selection for the Eurovision Song Contest 2023. They were chosen to represent Albania with the song "Duje". At Eurovision, the family performed "Duje" under the group name "Albina & Familja Kelmendi" ("Albina and the Kelmendi Family"). They finished 22nd in the grand final. == Sources == Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Albanian people Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants
title: Albina Kelmendi
